name: Astrid Restaked cbETH
description: Astrid is a restaking pool for EigenLayer. Users deposit cbETH to Astrid main contract and receive back rcbETH on a 1:1 ratio. Pooled LSTs/ETH are then divided and restaked to multiple different operators on EigenLayer. rcbETH is a rebaseable token (rebased daily), i.e. rewards are distributed via a rebase to keep the 1:1 peg of cbETH:rcbETH.
